applicationEnabled.description: Flag to control if an argocd application for the given repository should be automatically created.

repositoryEnabled.description: Flag to control if a git repository should be automatically created.

manifestId.description: Simple id to identify the to be created manifests.

gitRepositoryURL.description: URL for the git repository to use.

gitRepositoryPath.description: Path within the repository to use.

gitRepositoryPAT.description: Personal Access Token to connect towarads the git repository.

gitRepositoryUser.description: User to connect with towards the git service
